name: Yavalnoi
description: The Yavalnoi is a large, aberrant creature known for its anchor-shaped organ atop its head and its aquatic nature. It has long, muscular limbs for swimming and is typically covered in a slick, hydrodynamic layer.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate water and its Luminous Burst attack that outlines enemies make it a formidable opponent in aquatic battles.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate its environment and any intruders, using both physical and magical means to achieve this.
relations: May be encountered with giant crabs or giant octopuses that it summons with its Call of the Deep ability.
environment: Usually found in aquatic or coastal regions.
strengths: High hit points and damage resilience against cold, advanced melee attacks and extraordinary spellcasting capabilities.
weaknesses: Limited movement speed on land, making it vulnerable when out of water.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack with strong physical strikes including bites, claws, and a long-reaching tail.
most_powerful_ability: Luminous Burst, which outlines enemies in blue light, preventing them from breathing underwater and granting advantages on attack rolls against them.
senses: Possesses keen perception with a +6 modifier.
skills: Strong constitution saving throw, indicating resilience against various effects.
additional_information: Can breathe underwater due to its Water Breathing ability.
Innate spellcasting with spells like Ray of Enfeeblement and Control Water.
Can summon allies like giant crabs and giant octopuses for combat support.
Very good Constitution score, granting 126 hit points.
Challenging CR 6, presenting a significant threat to adventurers.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting with a spell save DC of 15, allowing it to cast spells without material components.
test_queries: large aquatic monster with powerful spells
creature that outlines enemies in blue light
summoner of giant crabs and octopuses
chaotic evil giant aberration in coastal areas
